name: escape-room-generator
description: This is my honours project for BsC(Hons) Computing: Application Software Development at Robert Gordon University

scripts.custombuild: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy "client\build" "server\public" /E /I
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run-script dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
